member.name: T:Sudoku.CodeGen.HashCode.Annotations.AutoHashCodeAttribute

member.name: T:Sudoku.CodeGen.HashCode.Annotations.HashCodeIgnoredMemberAttribute
member.summary: Indicates an attribute that marks a field or a property that tells the compiler the member will be ignored in the hash code calculation.

member.name: T:Sudoku.CodeGen.HashCode.Annotations.HashCodeIncludedMemberAttribute
member.summary: Indicates an attribute that marks a field or a property that tells the compiler the member will participate in the hash code calculation.
